  7/** @file    vsip/opt/expr/mcopy.hpp
  8    @author  Jules Bergmann
  9    @date    2008-09-19
 10    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Generic matrix copy/transpose evaluator.

 13#ifndef VSIP_OPT_EXPR_MCOPY_HPP
 14#define VSIP_OPT_EXPR_MCOPY_HPP
 15
 16#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 17# error "vsip/opt files cannot be used as part of the reference impl."
 18#endif
 19
 20#include <vsip/opt/expr/assign_fwd.hpp>
 21#include <vsip/opt/fast_transpose.hpp>
 22
 23namespace vsip
 24{
 25namespace impl
 26{
 27
 28/// Generic in-place transpose
 29template <typename T>
 30void
 31ip_transpose(T *d_ptr,
 32	     stride_type row_stride,
 33	     stride_type col_stride,
 34	     length_type rows,
 35	     length_type cols)
 36{
 37  for (index_type i=0; i<rows; ++i)
 38    for (index_type j=i; j<cols; ++j)
 39    {
 40      std::swap(d_ptr[col_stride * i + row_stride * j],
 41		d_ptr[col_stride * j + row_stride * i]);
 42    }
 43}
 44
 45/// Split-complex in-place transpose
 46template <typename T>
 47void
 48ip_transpose(std::pair<T*, T*> const &d,
 49	     stride_type row_stride,
 50	     stride_type col_stride,
 51	     length_type rows,
 52	     length_type cols)
 53{
 54  ip_transpose(d.first,  row_stride, col_stride, rows, cols);
 55  ip_transpose(d.second, row_stride, col_stride, rows, cols);
 56}
 57
 58/// Generic matrix copy.
 59template <typename T>
 60void
 61mcopy(T *d_ptr,
 62      T *s_ptr,
 63      stride_type d_stride_0,
 64      stride_type d_stride_1,
 65      stride_type s_stride_0,
 66      stride_type s_stride_1,
 67      length_type size_0,
 68      length_type size_1)
 69{
 70  if (d_stride_1 == 1 && s_stride_1 == 1)
 71  {
 72    // Dense
 73    if (d_stride_0 == static_cast<stride_type>(size_1) &&
 74	s_stride_0 == static_cast<stride_type>(size_1))
 75      memcpy(d_ptr, s_ptr, size_0*size_1*sizeof(T));
 76    // Contiguous rows
 77    else
 78      for (index_type i=0; i<size_0; ++i)
 79      {
 80	memcpy(d_ptr, s_ptr, size_1*sizeof(T));
 81	d_ptr += d_stride_0;
 82	s_ptr += s_stride_0;
 83      }
 84  }
 85  else
 86  {
 87    for (index_type i=0; i<size_0; ++i)
 88    {
 89      T* d_row = d_ptr;
 90      T* s_row = s_ptr;
 91      
 92      for (index_type j=0; j<size_1; ++j)
 93      {
 94	*d_row = *s_row;
 95	d_row += d_stride_1;
 96	s_row += s_stride_1;
 97      }
 98      
 99      d_ptr += d_stride_0;
100      s_ptr += s_stride_0;
101    }
102  }
103}
104
105/// Split-complex matrix copy.
106template <typename T>
107void
108mcopy(std::pair<T*, T*> const &d,
109      std::pair<T*, T*> const &s,
110      stride_type d_stride_0,
111      stride_type d_stride_1,
112      stride_type s_stride_0,
113      stride_type s_stride_1,
114      length_type size_0,
115      length_type size_1)
116{
117  mcopy(d.first, s.first,
118	d_stride_0, d_stride_1,
119	s_stride_0, s_stride_1,
120	size_0, size_1);
121  mcopy(d.second, s.second,
122	d_stride_0, d_stride_1,
123	s_stride_0, s_stride_1,
124	size_0, size_1);
125}
126} // namespace vsip::impl
127} // namespace vsip
128
129namespace vsip_csl
130{
131namespace dispatcher
132{
133/// Matrix copy and transpose evaluator.
134template <typename DstBlock, typename SrcBlock>
135struct Evaluator<op::assign<2>, be::transpose,
136		 void(DstBlock &, SrcBlock const &)>
137{
138  static char const* name()
139  {
140    char s = impl::Type_equal<src_order_type, row2_type>::value ? 'r' : 'c';
141    char d = impl::Type_equal<dst_order_type, row2_type>::value ? 'r' : 'c';
142    if      (s == 'r' && d == 'r')    return "Expr_Trans (rr copy)";
143    else if (s == 'r' && d == 'c')    return "Expr_Trans (rc trans)";
144    else if (s == 'c' && d == 'r')    return "Expr_Trans (cr trans)";
145    else /* (s == 'c' && d == 'c') */ return "Expr_Trans (cc copy)";
146  }
147
148  typedef typename DstBlock::value_type dst_value_type;
149  typedef typename SrcBlock::value_type src_value_type;
150
151  static bool const is_rhs_expr   = impl::Is_expr_block<SrcBlock>::value;
152
153  static bool const is_rhs_simple =
154    impl::Is_simple_distributed_block<SrcBlock>::value;
155
156  static bool const is_lhs_split  = impl::Is_split_block<DstBlock>::value;
157  static bool const is_rhs_split  = impl::Is_split_block<SrcBlock>::value;
158
159  static int const  lhs_cost      = impl::Ext_data_cost<DstBlock>::value;
160  static int const  rhs_cost      = impl::Ext_data_cost<SrcBlock>::value;
161
162  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<SrcBlock>::order_type src_order_type;
163  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<DstBlock>::order_type dst_order_type;
164
165  static bool const ct_valid =
166    impl::Type_equal<src_value_type, dst_value_type>::value &&
167    !is_rhs_expr &&
168    lhs_cost == 0 && rhs_cost == 0 &&
169    (is_lhs_split == is_rhs_split);
170
171  static bool rt_valid(DstBlock& /*dst*/, SrcBlock const& /*src*/)
172  { return true; }
173
174  static void exec(DstBlock& dst, SrcBlock const& src, row2_type, row2_type)
175  {
176    vsip::impl::Ext_data<DstBlock> d_ext(dst, vsip::impl::SYNC_OUT);
177    vsip::impl::Ext_data<SrcBlock> s_ext(src, vsip::impl::SYNC_IN);
178
179    impl::mcopy(d_ext.data(), s_ext.data(),
180		d_ext.stride(0), d_ext.stride(1),
181		s_ext.stride(0), s_ext.stride(1),
182		d_ext.size(0), d_ext.size(1));
183  }
184
185  static void exec(DstBlock& dst, SrcBlock const& src, col2_type, col2_type)
186  {
187    vsip::impl::Ext_data<DstBlock> d_ext(dst, vsip::impl::SYNC_OUT);
188    vsip::impl::Ext_data<SrcBlock> s_ext(src, vsip::impl::SYNC_IN);
189
190    impl::mcopy(d_ext.data(), s_ext.data(),
191		d_ext.stride(1), d_ext.stride(0),
192		s_ext.stride(1), s_ext.stride(0),
193		d_ext.size(1), d_ext.size(0));
194  }
195
196  static void exec(DstBlock& dst, SrcBlock const& src, col2_type, row2_type)
197  {
198    vsip::impl::Ext_data<DstBlock> dst_ext(dst, vsip::impl::SYNC_OUT);
199    vsip::impl::Ext_data<SrcBlock> src_ext(src, vsip::impl::SYNC_IN);
200
201    // In-place transpose
202    if (impl::is_same_ptr(dst_ext.data(), src_ext.data()))
203    {
204      // in-place transpose implies square matrix
205      assert(dst.size(2, 0) == dst.size(2, 1));
206      impl::ip_transpose(dst_ext.data(),
207			 dst_ext.stride(0), dst_ext.stride(1),
208			 dst.size(2, 0), dst.size(2, 1));
209    }
210    else if (dst_ext.stride(0) == 1 && src_ext.stride(1) == 1)
211    {
212      impl::transpose_unit(dst_ext.data(), src_ext.data(),
213			   dst.size(2, 0), dst.size(2, 1), // rows, cols
214			   dst_ext.stride(1),	           // dst_col_stride
215			   src_ext.stride(0));	           // src_row_stride
216    }
217    else
218    {
219      impl::transpose(dst_ext.data(), src_ext.data(),
220		      dst.size(2, 0), dst.size(2, 1),		// rows, cols
221		      dst_ext.stride(0), dst_ext.stride(1),	// dst strides
222		      src_ext.stride(0), src_ext.stride(1));	// srd strides
223    }
224  }
225
226  static void exec(DstBlock& dst, SrcBlock const& src, row2_type, col2_type)
227  {
228    vsip::impl::Ext_data<DstBlock> dst_ext(dst, vsip::impl::SYNC_OUT);
229    vsip::impl::Ext_data<SrcBlock> src_ext(src, vsip::impl::SYNC_IN);
230
231    // In-place transpose
232    if (impl::is_same_ptr(dst_ext.data(), src_ext.data()))
233    {
234      // in-place transpose implies square matrix
235      assert(dst.size(2, 0) == dst.size(2, 1));
236      impl::ip_transpose(dst_ext.data(),
237			 dst_ext.stride(0), dst_ext.stride(1),
238			 dst.size(2, 0), dst.size(2, 1));
239    }
240    else if (dst_ext.stride(1) == 1 && src_ext.stride(0) == 1)
241    {
242      impl::transpose_unit(dst_ext.data(), src_ext.data(),
243			   dst.size(2, 1), dst.size(2, 0), // rows, cols
244			   dst_ext.stride(0),	  // dst_col_stride
245			   src_ext.stride(1));	  // src_row_stride
246    }
247    else
248    {
249      impl::transpose(dst_ext.data(), src_ext.data(),
250		      dst.size(2, 1), dst.size(2, 0), // rows, cols
251		      dst_ext.stride(1), dst_ext.stride(0),	// dst strides
252		      src_ext.stride(1), src_ext.stride(0));	// srd strides
253    }
254  }
255
256  static void exec(DstBlock& dst, SrcBlock const& src)
257  {
258    exec(dst, src, dst_order_type(), src_order_type());
259  }
260};
261
262} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
263} // namespace vsip_csl
264
265#endif
